title: Slow cooker chicken and bean chilli
ingredients: ['215g cooked chicken meat, shredded', '1/2 onion, chopped', '2 tomatoes, chopped', '2 (425g) tins white hominy, drained', '1 (420g) tin chilli beans', '1 (220g) tin diced green chillies', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 pinch dried oregano', '1 litre chicken stock', '2 1/2 tablespoons instant mash']
